name: gengar
description: Under a full moon, this POKÃ©MON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

name: mimikyu-disguised
description: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.

name: scizor
description: It has a steel-hard body. It intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.

name: chimecho
description: CHIMECHO makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this POKÃ©MON becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.

name: meganium
description: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.

name: shuckle
description: The BERRIES it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.

name: jirachi
description: A legend states that JIRACHI will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKÃ©MON senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

name: celebi
description: This POKÃ©MON wanÂ­ ders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

name: swampert
description: SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This POKÃ©MON also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.

name: tyranitar
description: Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.

name: snorlax
description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

name: mienshao
description: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot even be seen.

name: raikou
description: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.

name: zapdos
description: A legendary bird POKÃ©MON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: regice
description: REGICEâs body was made during an ice age. The deep-frozen body canât be melted, even by fire. This POKÃ©MON controls frigid air of minus 328 degrees F.

name: lugia
description: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.

name: espeon
description: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its eneÂ­ my's actions.

name: altaria
description: ALTARIA dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKÃ©MON makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.

name: skarmory
description: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.

name: heracross
description: It is usually docile, but if it is disturbed while sipping honey, it chases off the intruder with its horn.

name: cofagrigus
description: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

name: kabutops
description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimÂ­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

name: genesect
description: Over 300 million years ago, it was feared as the strongest of hunters. It has been modified by Team Plasma.

name: ampharos
description: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

name: politoed
description: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gatherÂ­ ing from far and wide.

name: hitmontop
description: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.

name: cradily
description: CRADILY roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This POKÃ©MON freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.

name: milotic
description: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. They change color depending on the viewing angle.

name: metagross
description: METAGROSS has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This POKÃ©MON can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.

name: latias
description: LATIAS is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this POKÃ©MON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

name: magnezone
description: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.

name: togekiss
description: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.

name: rotom
description: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

name: gliscor
description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

name: aegislash-shield
description: Generations of kings were attended by these PokÃ©mon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and PokÃ©mon.

name: goodra
description: This very friendly Dragon-type PokÃ©mon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
